messages.subject: Question about upcoming payment
messages.body:
Hello,

I wanted to reach out regarding our loan (LN-2024-001). We have a question about the upcoming payment due on February 15th.

Could you please confirm the exact amount due including any late charges?

Thank you,
John Smith

messages.subject: Payment arrangement request
messages.body:
Dear Servicing Team,

I am writing to request a payment arrangement for my loan (LN-2024-015). Due to recent circumstances, I am having difficulty making the full payment this month.

Would it be possible to discuss a temporary payment plan? I am committed to getting back on track.

Please let me know what options are available.

Sincerely,
Michael Johnson

messages.subject: Insurance documentation submitted
messages.body:
Hi,

I have submitted the updated insurance documentation through the portal as requested.

Please confirm receipt and let me know if you need anything else.

Best regards,
Sarah Williams

messages.subject: Payoff quote request
messages.body:
Hello,

I would like to request a payoff quote for loan LN-2024-042. We are considering paying off the loan early.

Could you please provide the payoff amount good through the end of February?

Thank you,
Robert Davis

messages.subject: RE: Insurance documentation submitted
messages.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for submitting your updated insurance documentation. We have received and processed your submission.

Your account is now in good standing regarding insurance requirements.

Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions.

Best regards,
Portfolio Services Team

messages.subject: RE: Payoff quote request
messages.body:
Dear Robert,

Thank you for your payoff inquiry for loan LN-2024-042.

Your payoff quote good through February 28, 2026 is $142,567.89. This includes:
- Principal Balance: $140,234.56
- Accrued Interest: $1,890.33
- Recording Fee: $443.00

Please note this quote is valid for 30 days. Contact us if you would like to proceed.

Best regards,
Portfolio Services Team
